system.description:
This spell allows the caster to instantly kill or stun one or more creatures within 120 feet, with no saving throw unless stated otherwise.

Effects:

  • Single Target: If the target has 1-60 HP, it is instantly slain (no saving throw).
  • If the target has 61-100 HP, it is stunned for [[/r 1d4 #Turns Stunned]] (as Power Word Stun).
  • No creature with 101+ HP is affected.
  • Multiple Targets: Instead of a single victim, the caster may choose to slay up to five creatures if each has 20 HP or less (no saving throw).
  • Exception: A magic-user or any creature capable of casting magic-user spells may attempt a saving throw vs. spells at -4 penalty to resist the effect.
system.effect: Slays or stuns one or more creatures
